metadata.description: I build websites using modern technologies to provide excellent user interactions and facilitate continuous business growth, always striving to deliver the best experience.

HeroSection.title: I'm Mario
HeroSection.subtitle: Frontend Developer
HeroSection.description: Always improving to make the software of your dreams come true

description.p1: I'm a self-taught software developer who loves learning new things and strives to improve every day.
description.p2: Focused on web development, working with React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Playwright, Cypress, and other modern technologies.

ProjectsSection.title: My Projects
ProjectsSection.description: These are some of my last projects

projectDescriptions.markdownPreviewerDescription: In this project, you can input Markdown code and instantly receive both a Preview and HTML code, which you can easily copy to your clipboard with a single click.
projectDescriptions.randomQuoteMachineDescription: This is a project where you can obtain a random quote by clicking the 'New Quote' button and easily share it on Twitter with just one click on the Twitter icon.
projectDescriptions.githubDevfinderDescription: This project is a GitHub DevFinder, where you can search for developers by their GitHub username. The application displays the user's profile picture, description, username, followers, following
